Issue.creator: jlcs
Issue.description: DEBU 7aa49 0m 0xc0031a0a40 signature for identity 1 is invalid: The signature is invalid ``` My petition is to change the debug messages to something more descriptive of the reason of the invalid signature, as it now seems it is a failure in the signature itself, not the difference between the write sets of the first endorsement checked and the current one being validated. Also, it might be a bug if indeed the peer checks all write sets against the first endorsement, instead of trying to construct a valid endorsement with the rest of endorsements that might have the same write set. >
